page.title: 01A GENERAL SUMMARY
page.content: Our block is a very rural area.It contains only three small areas of housing _ the villages of Durston, Charlton and West Lyng.There is a mixture of dairy farming,cereal, vegetable and fruit growing. One kilometre of the M5 crosses the very edge of the block.There are six roads in the block, one well_used "A"road and five minor country lanes. Running through the area is the River Tone, the Bridgwater and Taunton Canal and a mainline railway track. The section on the edge of Sedgemoor is very flat and the whole area gently undulates. In this quiet,largely unspoilt piece of Somerset,the people seem to have the best of both worlds:the peace and tranquility of the village,while being only four kilometres from Taunton,the busy county town of Somerset.
